flavor: During your youth, your clanâ€™s ancestral home was conquered by enemies or destroyed in a natural disaster. You were among the displaced survivors who built a new life, most likely in a nearby human settlement. Did your parents survive the disaster? If not, who raised you? Were the survivors welcomed into the new community, or were you ostracized? Do you dream of someday rebuilding your ancestral home?
name: Dwarf - Ancestral Home Lost
